draft_then_user_check.description: LLM generates draft, user performs grammar check and paraphrase
draft_then_user_check.instructions: Generate a draft completion. User will grammar-check and paraphrase afterward.

outline_only.description: LLM generates outline only, user expands to full content
outline_only.instructions: Generate only an outline or structure, not complete text.

complete_with_checklist.description: LLM generates complete text with verification checklist
complete_with_checklist.instructions: Generate complete text but include a verification checklist for the user.

iterative_refinement.description: Multiple rounds of LLM suggestions with user feedback
iterative_refinement.instructions: Generate suggestions that will be iteratively refined with user feedback.

research_synthesis.description: LLM synthesizes research notes into structured content
research_synthesis.instructions: Synthesize provided research notes into coherent structured content.
